name: Curse of the cat god VR
name_original: Curse of the cat god VR
description:
You angered the cat god by stealing the figurines from his temple and now you need to throw out the loot in order to be saved.

Team: VR BROS

Gameplay Instructions 

The game will launch in debug mode if vr headset is not connected!

IF YOU ARE PLAYING WITHOUT VR HEADSET: Move: WASD; Rotate camera: mouse; left/right hand: left/right mouse button;

IF YOU ARE PLAYING WITH VR HEADSET:

Trigger buttons to use hands (controlls tested on oculus rift s)

Platform: Windows

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission 

1.Hands and some of the code from vr template

2. Splash and metal sounds from https://freesound.org/
